Question.Subject: Ebay Question... Help me out?
Question.Content:
If you are every bored and play on Ebay like me... you should notice this...
Can ANYONE explain to me why people bid MORE than the value of the gift card up for bid?
Example... I just saw a $500 Wal Mart dollar gift card sell for $505.82 and another $25.00 gift card sell for $25.76.
Is there something I am missing out on?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Sometime the owner of the gift cards have different account in ebay and if they see that the product they have is not selling to they price they want they just put there own price so that anybody buy the card. Usually these people have a not trustful account. I hope I answers you question

Answer.Content: these people are stupid! loll unless its limited addition or some collectors item shit its stupidddddddddd lol
There may be significance about those Gift cards or the extra money could of been shipping fees

Sometime the owner of the gift cards have different account in ebay and if they see that the product they have is not selling to they price they want they just put there own price so that anybody buy the card. Usually these people have a not trustful account. I hope I answers you question
